summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.7°C) and outside temperature (down 2.7°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 6040 lux) and cloud levels (up 260 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13559 lux), cloud levels (up 1725 m), feels like temperature (up 5.5°C), and outside temperature (up 4.7°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and low sunlight due to cloudy or overcast skies. Weather could become unsettled.
